text: Converts connected geometry and volumes into collision object for SOP FLIP fluids.

This node accepts 2D and 3D geometry, and volumes as collision objects for SOP-based FLIP fluids. To turn an object into a collision object, connect the object with the 4th input of the node. Accurate velocities for moving collision objects are also very important for fluid simulations in general, but particularly for FLIP. Incorrect collision velocities can lead to less dynamic splashes or fluid leaking through geometry.
